ValidationRule.description: Prevent Merchant Services reps from modifying records per Status value and record type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Payment Processing (DSA) Opportunity" ), (ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Sold - Started")), (NOT(ISCHANGED(StageName))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES ZONE 30 ANCILLARY"))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"System Administrator"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'Paychex Marketing Admin'))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The record is locked and cannot be edited.
